sentences.sContent: rules and regulations that stifle innovation
How can this party stifle debate on such a crucial issue?
sentences.sCn: 该党怎么可以压制对这么一个重要问题的辩论？

words.tran: 使窒息；粉碎（stifle的现在分词）

trans.tranCn: 使窒息， 闷死， 闷住； 扼杀， 抑制， 阻止； 掩盖， 藏匿
trans.tranOther: to stop something from happening or developing
